''Groussherzogtum LÃ«tzebuerg'' {{lb icon}} | conventional_long_name = Luxembourg | image_map = Location Luxembourg EU Europe.png }} This article covers Euro [[Gold]] and [[Silver]] coins Issued by the 'Banque Centrale Du Luxembourg'. It also covers rare cases of collectors coins (coins not planned for normal circulation) minted using other precious metals. This article however, does not cover either the [[â¬2 commemorative coins|Luxembourg â¬2 commemorative coins]] or the [[Commemorative coins of Luxembourg|Luxembourg Franc commemorative coins]].
